{"id":954217613,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1684636871,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"106 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/954217613/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Lexicographically Smallest Palindrome","memory":"44.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeSmallestPalindrome(String s) {\n        int start=0;\n        int end=s.length()-1;\n       while(start<=end){\n           if(s.charAt(start)-'a'==s.charAt(end)-'a'){\n               start++;\n               end--;\n           }\n           else{\n               if(s.charAt(start)-'a'<s.charAt(end)-'a'){\n                   s= s.substring(0,end)+s.charAt(start)+s.substring(end+1,s.length());\n                   \n               }\n               else{\n                   s= s.substring(0,start)+s.charAt(end)+s.substring(start+1,s.length());\n                   \n               }\n               start++;\n               end--;\n           }\n           \n           \n       }\n        return s;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"lexicographically-smallest-palindrome","has_notes":false}
